question.prompt: The man said, "I don't often lose things and I'm always careful with money." When reporting this, he would say he _____.

options.label: didn't often lose things and was always careful with money.
doesn't often lose things and is always careful with money.
hadn't often lost things and had always been careful with money.
wouldn't often lose things and would always be careful with money.

hint: Thì hiện tại đơn (don't lose, am careful) lùi về quá khứ đơn (didn't lose, was careful) trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The man said, "I was quite surprised when I reached for my wallet and it wasn't there." He reported that he _____.

options.label: was quite surprised when he reached for his wallet and it wasn't there.
had been quite surprised when he had reached for his wallet and it hadn't been there.
has been quite surprised when he reached for his wallet and it wasn't there.
would be quite surprised when he reached for his wallet and it wasn't there.

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (was surprised, reached, wasn't) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had been surprised, had reached, hadn't been) trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The man knew, "I had it with me just before I walked into the restaurant." He knew he _____ with him just before he _____ into the restaurant.

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (had, walked) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had had, had walked) trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The head of the restaurant asked the man, "Is anything wrong?" The head of the restaurant asked him if anything _____.

hint: Thì hiện tại đơn (is) lùi về quá khứ đơn (was) trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The man told the head of the restaurant, "I didn't want to do so; I was in a hurry because I had to reach my waiting room." He told him he _____ to do so; he _____ in a hurry because he _____ to reach his waiting room.

options.label: hadn't wanted / had been / had had
wouldn't want / would be / would have

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (didn't want, was) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (hadn't wanted, had been). 'Had to' (quá khứ đơn) lùi về 'had had to' (quá khứ hoàn thành).

question.prompt: The man mentioned that "some people were waiting to see me" in his waiting room. He mentioned that some people _____ to see him.

hint: Thì quá khứ tiếp diễn (were waiting) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn (had been waiting) trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The man told the head of the restaurant, "My biggest worry at the moment was how I was going to pay for the meal." He told him that his biggest worry at that moment _____ how he _____ to pay for the meal.

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (was) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had been). 'Was going to' (quá khứ đơn của 'be going to') lùi về 'had been going to' (quá khứ hoàn thành).

question.prompt: The head of the restaurant said, "I will send you a bill." He said he _____ him a bill.

hint: 'Will' lùi về 'would' trong câu tường thuật.

question.prompt: The man thought, "it was possible that I could have left it at home." He thought it _____ possible that he _____ left it at home.

options.label: had been / had been able to

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (was) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had been). 'Could have + V3' (diễn tả khả năng trong quá khứ) không lùi thì.

question.prompt: The man wondered, "if it was possible that it could have dropped out of my pocket while I was eating dinner." He wondered if it _____ possible that it _____ out of his pocket while he _____ dinner.

options.label: was / could have dropped / was eating
had been / could have dropped / had been eating
had been / had dropped / had eaten

hint: Thì quá khứ đơn (was) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành (had been). 'Could have + V3' không lùi thì. Thì quá khứ tiếp diễn (was eating) lùi về quá khứ hoàn thành tiếp diễn (had been eating).
